name: Tumultuous Payroll of Mr Dice
description:
Tumultuous Payroll of Mr Dice is a short game of chances where you play as titular Mr Dice doing budgeting for a growing gamedev company.

Budgeting on random numbers is a skill not many posses, but somehow you need to make it work until the game release while trying to satisfy each department ever growing needs. I heard that The Board is especially insatiable

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
